careers.bottom-heading: CAN’T FIND THE JOB FOR YOU?
careers.bottom-sub: Maybe we just didn’t know that it’s you we’re looking for!
careers.bottom-sub1: Win us over with a cover letter
careers.promo: Sportstats is defined by our insistence on providing an unparalleled customer experience. All of our team members are charged with bringing creativity, honesty, and intellectual rigor to their responsibilities in a never-ending quest to delight our customers. We have high expectations of each other and work as a team to build things we are all proud of.
careers.sub-heading: Looking for a exciting career or weekend job opportunity, contact us as we are always hiring!
careers.title: Careers

help.cant-find-help: Can't Find what you are looking for?
help.title: Hjälpcenter
help.welcome: Welcome to the Sportstats Help Center

overview.contact_heading: In order to contact us, please feel free to fill out the following form. We will get back to you as fast as possible. Anything regarding corrections, please fill out this form.
overview.content2-1: Vi anpassar alltid för varje enskilts lopps åldersgrupper, specialkategorier, övergripande resultat, lag och stafetter.
overview.content2-2: Förbättra deltagarnas upplevelse med skräddarsydda certifikat och tillgång till foton från målgången.
overview.content3-1: Tillgängliga på 100% av loppen kan deltagare, familj och vänner få live-uppdateringar direkt på sina mobiler, datorer eller Twitter-konton under loppet.
overview.content3-2: Insert custom messages for all social updates including sponsors, links etc...
overview.content4: Viewing your event results has never been easier on your mobile, tablet or desktop devices. Never lose contact with you audience - always stay connected
overview.sub-heading: De bästa tidtagningssystemen med teknik från MyLaps (ChampionChip, ProChip och BibTag) och race|resultat
overview.title: Världens största tidtagningsföretag för sport

reset-details: Enter your email address below and we'll send you a link with instructions.

info.birthdate: Why is my date of birth required to use Sportstats? You must be at least 13 years old to use Sportstats. This data also allows us to provide you with more accurate performance analysis. We don't share your date of birth or display this information on your profile.
